Document.title: Output Format Demo
Document.paragraphs: This demo shows the three output formats supported by markdown_lab:
Having multiple output formats provides several advantages:
Format conversion is performed efficiently using Rust implementations.

lists.items: JSON - Structured data format for programmatic usage
XML - Markup format for document interchange

code_blocks.code:
# Sample Python code from markdown_lab.markdown_lab_rs import convert_html_to_format
result = convert_html_to_format(html_content, url, "json")

# Sample Python code from markdown_lab.markdown_lab_rs import convert_html_to_format
result = convert_html_to_format(html_content, url, "json")

Document.blockquotes: Format conversion is performed efficiently using Rust implementations.
